text: A map of Helsingin keskustaajama The Helsinki urban area (, ), is the largest taajama in Finland. It's located in the Uusimaa region in Finland and has about 1.23 million inhabitants as of 2019. The urban area includes, among other areas, the city of Helsinki as well as the cities of Espoo and Vantaa. ==See also== *Tampereen keskustaajama *List of urban areas in the Nordic countries ==References== Category:Geography of Helsinki Category:Espoo Category:Vantaa Category:Greater Helsinki ==External links== *Helsinki urban area map at Wikimedia Commons
title: Helsinki urban area
